com.github.rmielnik.list

Class AbstractViewHolder<T extends RecyclerItem>

  • com.github.rmielnik.list.AbstractViewHolder<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T -

    is a class that implements interface RecyclerItem or an interface that extends interface RecyclerItem. Instances of T can be passed to bind in order to be represented on a View.

    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractUpdatableViewHolder

    public class AbstractViewHolder<T extends RecyclerItem>

    An extension of RecyclerView.ViewHolder that exposes an abstract method for updating data in View.

    class AbstractViewHolder exposes bind method that is used by SimpleListAdapter.onBindViewHolder to automate updating View attached to this ViewHolder.

    See Also:
    class AbstractViewHolder, bind, SimpleListAdapter.onBindViewHolder

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      AbstractViewHolder(android.view.View view)
      An extension of RecyclerView.ViewHolder that exposes an abstract method for updating data in View.
